name: fabricator-starter
description: A starter toolkit for your fabricator based toolkit.
author: Dieter Geerts <dieter@dworks.be>

scripts.start: cd node_modules && cd fabricator-builder && npm start -- --config="../../fabricatorConfig.json" --toolkitConfig="../../toolkitConfig.json" && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.build: cd node_modules && cd fabricator-builder && npm run build -- --config="../../fabricatorConfig.json" --toolkitConfig="../../toolkitConfig" && cd .. && cd ..
